attributes.action: Make people have to have a licence to own an animal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I personally think that people should have to have a licence to own an animal as there are so many mistreated animals in this world! Dangerous dogs get into the hands of the wrong people and end up getting hurt and destroyed due to turning out violent! Animals are unpredictable and dangerous and letting the wrong people have an animals is making things worse, animals deserve a good life so make sure they get the right owner!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
